abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections look at the impact of government surveillance revelations on digital currency trading and at a software executive’s good reviews at an Apple event.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Bitcoin Sell-Off and an Apple Star
